bookTitle: The Secret of the Old Clock
bookAuthors: Carolyn Keene, Russell H. Tandy, Sara Paretsky
Plot: Nancy, unaided, seeks to find a missing will. To the surprise of many, the Topham family will inherit wealthy Josiah Crowley's fortune, instead of deserving relatives and friends who were promised inheritances. Nancy determines that a clue to a second will might be found in an old clock Mr. Crowley had owned and she seeks to find the timepiece. Her search not only tests her keen mind, but also leads her into a thrilling adventure.
Characters: Nancy Drew, Carson Drew, Hannah Gruen, Ada Topham, Helen Corning, Allison Horner, Josiah Crowley, Isabel Topham, Richard Topham, Cora Topham, Henry Rolsted, Grace Horner, Matilda Turner, Edna Turner, William Mathews, Fred Mathews, Abigail Rowen, Jeff Tucker, Mary Turner
